steps: step 3: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/chekhly-na-iphone'
step 5: Click on link 'Place an order'
step 6: Proceed to checkout after selecting items
step 7: Enter shipping details for payment
step 8: Click on input field 'payment method id'
step 9: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
